humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor, which is invasive ductal carcinoma and measures 1.8 cm in greatest dimension. This is within the range for T1 tumors (2 cm or less), so the T stage for this patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, it is stated that the 'invasive carcinoma measures 1.8 cm in greatest dimension.' This puts the tumor size at greater than 1 cm but not more than 3 cm, which corresponds to a T2 stage. The fact that there is no lymphovascular invasion and negative margins of resection also support this T stage.
